name: Hexarinth
description:
- Kinda long loading screen.

- Your goal is to reach the top.

- When the game starts, you and your opponent will place 5 yellow tiles which prevents access to that tile.

- Each round you can move a single adjacent tile.

- There are three rounds, and each round you've got 1, 2, 3 action points that can be used to move or place another yellow tile anywhere on map. (You can place yellow tiles by pressing and holding left mouse button(Don't try to place yellow tiles on where you can move :D)). After 3 round, the rounds are reset, you begin with 1 action points.

- Destroying yellow tiles are RNG, you might or might not move into yellow tile if you click on it.

- Bugs are present, game should work smoothly, if it isn't, that's a bug you're pushing.

-- Bugs --

Sometimes you might drop a yellow tile on a tile which you wanted to move.

You can't place yellow tiles on some tiles at the beginning.

AI has a loop, the shortest path can create infinite loops.
